solution_line_template: Antonov was left with {total_candies_bought} - {candies_in_given_pack} = <<{total_candies_bought}-{candies_in_given_pack}={remaining_candies_pieces}>>{remaining_candies_pieces} pieces of candy.
Therefore, he still has {remaining_candies_pieces} / {pieces_per_pack} = <<{remaining_candies_pieces}/{pieces_per_pack}={remaining_packs}>>{remaining_packs} packs of candy.
